scripts.start:flipmoney-testnet: bash ./prepare_target.sh flipmoney && export REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && env-cmd -f .env.flipmoneyTestnet react-app-rewired start
scripts.build:flipmoney-testnet: bash ./prepare_target.sh flipmoney && export REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 && env-cmd -f .env.flipmoneyTestnet react-app-rewired build && rm build/projects/ -R

scripts.build:roc-testnet: bash ./prepare_target.sh roc && export REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 && env-cmd -f .env.rocTestnet react-app-rewired build && rm build/projects/ -R
